==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|めい|めい|ほう|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=めいめいほう|命名|tr1=meimei|t1=denomination, naming|法|tr2=hō|t2=law, rule, convention}}.<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|めいめいほう}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|めいめいほう|hhira=めいめいはふ}}

# [[nomenclature]]: a [[convention]] for [[categorizing]] and [[naming]] things

====Usage notes====
The sense of {{m|en|nomenclature}} of “a set of names or terms” is expressed by the Japanese words {{m|ja|用語|tr=yōgo||term, terminology}}, {{m|ja|用語集|tr=yōgoshū|lit=term collection}}, {{m|ja|専門語|tr=senmongo||specialist or technical term}}, {{m|ja|学名|tr=gakumei||scientific or technical name}}, {{m|ja|名称集|tr=meishōshū|lit=name or label collection}}.
